Silence::

She contemplated this for a moment. "Well, you mentioned the alien was
with her spark.  Is it integrated into her spark, or just in the same
compartment?" She had an idea.  It wasn't a great idea, but if
Nightlight's spark was just in the same spark chamber, but still
seperate from the alien, then something could be done. If not, then
there were other options. "I can help you sir. But first, answer that
and one more question for me.  Do you already have a protoform able to
be used?" 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Rodimus:
> 
> Rodimus sighed, it would be hard to explain. "If I would'n have seen
this that I'll tell ya, I would be fidn to belive it" 
> 
> Rodimus started to tell Silence about his wife and how when he told
her that his dutties may risk his life to get back amemories from his
past, that will help him to defeat unicron, she fainted. He also told
her about Vok's alliens and how they claimed Earth as their Lab in
first BW.
> After that, he ends his story with the revelation that somehow one
of those alliens had taken posesion to his beloved wife's body and
that some scanners had revealed that Nighlight's signature has almost
vanished but according with the allien her spark still was inside her,
and she (The vork) asked to get a deal to free her, either let her act
and stop Unicron or giving her a blank protophorm, He also added that
for Nighlight's and MAximal's security, she had to remain in stasis
keeping that allien trapped there while he got a way to take out her
the vork. He and Kup had an idea  how bring her back.. but he would
feel better knowing that someone else skilled as him, can help in the
process.
> 
> "That's all our story..."said the male with a sigh
> 
>

>   Silence::
> 
>   She looked down and sighed very softly. "Sir, I do not know. I think I
>   might be, but I am not sure of all my skills. I do now I have an
>   acceptible level, but I do not know if I have what you require. What
>   exactly is the problem?"
